    <footnotes>
        <footnote id="F1">Represents stock award which is fully vested on the date of grant.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F2">Each restricted stock unit represents a contingent right to receive one share of Microsoft common stock.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F3">Dividend equivalent rights accrue when and as dividends are paid on the Company's common stock and become exercisable proportionately with the restricted stock units to which they relate.</footnote>
        <footnote id="F4">The restricted stock units are fully vested. Delivery of the shares to the reporting person will be made 30 days after the date of the reporting person's separation from service to the Board of Directors.</footnote>
    </footnotes>

    <ownerSignature>
